author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ القَدِيرُ وَبِالإِجابَةِ جَدِيرٌ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ العَلِيمُ الخَبِيرُ.
translation: Thou, in truth, art the God of strength and power, Who art meet to answer them that pray Thee. There is no God save Thee, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.
